string.text: Deal damage to non-swinging polearms. Enabled by default.
Multiplier for a non-swinging polearm's HP based on its handling. Default is 20.
Deal damage to swinging polearms. Enabled by default.
Multiplier for a swinging polearm's HP based on its handling. Default is 40.
Multiplier for damage to polearms for player characters. Default is 1.0.
Multiplier for damage to polearms for non-player characters. Default is 1.0.
Multiplier for damage increment to polearms based on relative movement speed. Default is 50%.
Multiplier for damage decrement to polearms based on Polearm skill. Default is 0.33%.
